about_the_game:
The highly anticipated Lust Theory Season 3 is now available for WISHLIST!

Unlike most people, Sky’s life was marked by tragedy at a young age. Suddenly forced to spend her waking hours overwhelmed with study and work, her days became a grey blur. After several years of painstaking efforts, Sky had finally finished college. Wanting to celebrate this joyous occasion, Margot - Sky's best friend - barely manages to drag Sky out of her hidey-hole and into a world of frivolous fun. Though, tragedy isn’t the same as lightning and it likes to strike the same person twice.


Accompany Sky and experience the struggles and difficulties she'll have to face and overcome; the lessons she will have to learn, the things she'll have to risk and sacrifice on a journey towards the end. Witness just how bright a dying candle can shine.









Game Content:
- 10.000+ IMAGES
- 1.000+ ANIMATIONS

Gameplay:
- Dialogue choices
- Branching Story
- Free roam
- Time Cycle
- In-game Hint system
- Define the relationships within the game
- Change angle
- Lust time
- And much more


WARNING!
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content, drug abuse and controversial sexual content (incest) that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Lust Theory - Season 3


About the Game

The highly anticipated Lust Theory Season 3 is now available for WISHLIST!

Unlike most people, Sky’s life was marked by tragedy at a young age. Suddenly forced to spend her waking hours overwhelmed with study and work, her days became a grey blur. After several years of painstaking efforts, Sky had finally finished college. Wanting to celebrate this joyous occasion, Margot - Sky's best friend - barely manages to drag Sky out of her hidey-hole and into a world of frivolous fun. Though, tragedy isn’t the same as lightning and it likes to strike the same person twice.


Accompany Sky and experience the struggles and difficulties she'll have to face and overcome; the lessons she will have to learn, the things she'll have to risk and sacrifice on a journey towards the end. Witness just how bright a dying candle can shine.









Game Content:
- 10.000+ IMAGES
- 1.000+ ANIMATIONS

Gameplay:
- Dialogue choices
- Branching Story
- Free roam
- Time Cycle
- In-game Hint system
- Define the relationships within the game
- Change angle
- Lust time
- And much more


WARNING!
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content, drug abuse and controversial sexual content (incest) that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite 10.10
  • Processor: Intel "Core i5" processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2 or WebGL
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Limits of Sky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Sexo Explícito
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Limits of Sky is a comedy/drama adult video game in which a young girl - in the face of her own mortality - tries to live out her life to the fullest.
